la.decomposition

Class LUDecomposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • la.decomposition.LUDecomposition

  • public class LUDecomposition
extends java.lang.Object
    A Java implementation of LU decomposition using Gaussian elimination with row pivoting.
    Version:
    1.0 Dec. 7th, 2013
    Author:
    Mingjie Qian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LUDecomposition(Matrix A)
      Construct an LUDecomposition instance from a square real matrix.
